com.eco.bio7.batch

Class Bio7Dialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eco.bio7.batch.Bio7Dialog

  • public class Bio7Dialog
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides some default dialogs for the Bio7 application.
    Author:
    Bio7

        Parameters:
        text - the text for the dialog.

      • decision

        public static void decision(java.lang.String text)
        Opens a decision Dialog with the given text. The decision dialog will set the variable in the Flow editor of the bio7 application to true or false depending on the decision.
        Parameters:
        text - the text for the dialog.

      • message

        public static void message(java.lang.String text)
        Opens a message Dialog with the given text.
        Parameters:
        text - the text for the dialog.

        public static java.lang.String directory(java.lang.String text)
        Opens a Directory Dialog with the given text.
        Parameters:
        text - the text for the dialog.
        Returns:
        a string with the selected directory.

      • openFile

        public static java.lang.String openFile()
        Opens a file-open dialog.
        Returns:
        a file path as a string from the file dialog.

      • openFile

        public static java.lang.String openFile(java.lang.String[] extension)
        Opens a file-open dialog which displays the file with the given extensions.
        Parameters:
        extension - the extensions as a String array which should be displayed.
        Returns:
        a file path as a string from the file dialog.

      • openMultipleFiles

        public static java.lang.String[] openMultipleFiles()
        Opens a file-open dialog for multiple selections.
        Returns:
        a String array with the file paths of the selected files.

      • getCurrentPath

        public static java.lang.String getCurrentPath()
        A method which returns the current path for the multiple file dialog.
        Returns:
        the system path as a String for the multiple file dialog.

      • saveFile

        public static java.lang.String saveFile()
        Opens a file-save dialog.
        Returns:
        a file path as a string from the file dialog.

      • saveFile

        public static java.lang.String saveFile(java.lang.String arg)
        Opens a file-save dialog and opens a confirmation dialog if the file exists.
        Parameters:
        arg - the extension of the file.
        Returns:
        a file path as a string from the file dialog.
